import * as actionTypes from "./shopping-types";

const INITIAL_STATE = {
  products: [
    {
      id: 1,
      name: "B",
      size: "G",
      brand: "Palentir Technologies",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",

        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 2,
      name: "J",
      size: "B",
      brand: "Uber",

      price: 227,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 5,
      name: "B",
      size: "G",
      brand: "American Express",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",

    },
    {

      brand: "Bumble",
      image:

    },
    {
      id: 8,
      name: "R",
      size: "S",
      brand: "Retool",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      price: 395,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 9,
      name: "D",
      size: "O",
      brand: "Gong",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      price: 423,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 10,
      name: "W",
      size: "R",
      brand: "Nike",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      price: 50,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 11,
      name: "X",
      size: "Y",
      brand: "Bumble",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      price: 497,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 12,
      name: "X",
      size: "J",
      brand: "Doist",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      price: 359,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 13,
      name: "T",
      siz: "R",
      brand: "Costco Wholesale",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      price: 235,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 14,
      name: "X",
      size: "H",
      brand: "DoorDash",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      price: 15,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
    {
      id: 15,
      name: "R",
      size: "J",
      brand: "Nike",
      image:
        "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/62/98/b0/6298b026a65cf80bcf9dce061e9b79c9.png",
      price: 87,
      rating: "⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️",
      description:
        "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.",
    },
  ],
   
   //id, name, image, price, desc, size
  cart: [], //id, name, image, price, desc, size, qty
  currentItem: null,
};

const shopReducer = (state = INITIAL_STATE, action) => {
  switch (action.type) {
    case actionTypes.ADD_TO_CART:
      //Item data from products array
      const item = state.products.find(
        (product) => product.id === action.payload.id
      );
      // Check if Item is in cart already
      const inCart = state.cart.find((item) =>
        item.id === action.payload.id ? true : false
      );
      return {
        ...state,
        cart: inCart
          ? state.cart.map((item) =>
              item.id === action.payload.id
                ? { ...item, qty: item.qty + 1 }
                : item
            )
          : [...state.cart, { ...item, qty: 1 }],
      };

    case actionTypes.REMOVE_FROM_CART:
      return {
        ...state,
        cart: state.cart.filter((item) => item.id !== action.payload.id),
      };


    case actionTypes.ADJUST_ITEM_QTY:
      return {
        ...state,
        cart: state.cart.map((item) =>
          item.id === action.payload.id
            ? { ...item, qty: +action.payload.qty }
            : item
        ),
      };


    case actionTypes.LOAD_CURRENT_ITEM:
      return {
        ...state,
        currentItem: action.payload,
      };


    default:
      return state;
  }
};

export default shopReducer;
